bug.author: YunsongB
bug.summary: AutoML auto-ml-forecasting-beer-remote notebook may fail in the testing run
bug.description:
In recent release of the azureml-automl-runtime package version 1.17.0, we introduced a bug that may cause the auto-ml-forecasting-beer-remote notebook to fail at the testing run cells. The error is "Submitted script failed with a non-zero exit code;". <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/39966392/98309151-a042ba00-1f7e-11eb-9e43-a649e76e870f.png></denchmark-link>
We have fixed the bug and released the update in this repo, if you encounter this error, please upgrade and download the latest notebook files.
